txt.en: You have found a torn page of journal. Its edges are worn from ash and heat. Perhaps you can find other pages around Naerband Prison and complete the story.
\qBefore the Mountain raged, I was the master of all that transpired within the iron walls of the Direhold. I was the greatest of the Dark Lord's torturers.\q
\qBut on the day the Mountain was rent asunder and its fires cascaded, when the iron walls of Naerband became not just a prison, but an oven.\q
\qWhen the screams of the roasting doomed filled the air, I beheld that savage masterwork and knew that Sauron, even in death and ruin, was truly the master.\q
\qI have much to learn if I am to become Shakh Thraknûl, and surpass the Dark Lord in the arts of pain. I need some new captives.\q
Pages of a tome can be found scattered around Naerband Prison. Perhaps you can complete the story if you find them all.
Completed

The story is complete. The Uruk, Thraknûl, chief torturer of Naerband, witnessed the destruction of Sauron and the eruption of Mount Doom. His goal is to perfect the art of torture in the name of the fallen Dark Lord.
Lost Lore of Gorgoroth: Naerband Prison
Collect Page 1
Completed.
Collect Page 2
Collect Page 3
Gather Ash-worn Pages.
Collect Page 4
\qBefore the Mountain raged, I was called Thraknûl. I was the warden of Naerband, the greatest of Lord Sauron's prisons.\q
Gather Ash-worn Pages
Collect Page 5
\qBy His command, I devised pains and torments unequalled in any of the Ages of the world.\q
Ash-worn Pages can be found scattered around Dor Amarth.\n\nYou should collect the pages to complete the story.
